title: Mineral Sun Care with an Ayurvedic Twist
author: Harish
excerpt: Mineral powders with botanicals like amla offer lightweight, calming sun protection ideal for Pitta-prone skin.
content:
Why Mineral Powders Are Rising in Ayurveda-Inspired Beauty

Many people with sensitive, acne-prone, or Pitta-dominant skin prefer lighter textures that don't clog pores. Mineral powders offer a breathable alternative.

The Role of Zinc Oxide

Zinc oxide provides physical sun protection by forming a light-reflective barrier. In powder form, it feels lighter and more comfortable during hot seasons.

Amla & Rice Powder Benefits

  • Amla: Cooling, brightening, and antioxidant-rich.
  • Rice Powder: Smooths skin, reduces shine, and calms excess oil.

How to Use Face SPF Powder

Apply after moisturizer or light serum. Dust evenly across forehead, cheeks, nose, and chin. Reapply after sweating.

When to Use Traditional Sunscreen

For long or intense sun exposure, use a dermatologically-tested full-spectrum sunscreen along with protective clothing.
